{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$2.1M in 2021-2022 on contracts with FINNING INTERNATIONAL.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [FINNING INTERNATIONAL INC](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22FINNING%20INTERNATIONAL%20INC%22)
- [Finning International Inc](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Finning%20International%20Inc%22)
- [Finning International Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Finning%20International%20Inc.%22)
{{< /details >}}
